rounds.observation:
[GAME] Player 0, prepare for battle in this Competitive Tic Tac Toe Match!
Dominate the board by forming an unbreakable line of three marks in any direction.
Strike at your chosen cell (numbered 0-8) by declaring your attack in the required format.
Attack command: '[5]' launches your assault on the center position.

Your weapon of choice is 'O', while your adversary wields 'X'.

I can complete two simultaneous winning lines in different directions if I place at [2].  
That would threaten both the top row (X| |O at 0,4,8 vs 1,2) and the diagonal ( |O|O along 4,8 to 2).  
But the obvious winning priority here is the top-row two-diag fork, which will soon win me the game. I claim [2]:

[2]

I will select [5] as it creates a vertical threat with my 'X' in [0].

[5]
